TopicTitle: C7Studios Recaps the LANfest KSP Tournament at SXSW Gaming

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1dWv8IK"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/393d534bcea80ba30ac28703b4681f1f/tumblr_inline_n2ecoxJBKa1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p><span><strong>C7Studios</strong> shares his heartwarming experience from the <strong>LANfest</strong> <em>KSP</em> tournament at <strong>SXSW</strong> in a new article posted to the <em>KSP</em> <a href="http://bit.ly/1dWv8IK">Forum</a>. If you’ve ever wondered how diverse and how cool the <em>KSP</em> community is, look no further than <a href="http://bit.ly/1dWv8IK"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</span></p>

<p></p>
I really enjoyed reading this story! It made me really happy about what KSP can do and it shows how passionate the KSP devs really are!
